Update 10/10: After jumping back up to nearly full price, Amazon is once again offering all-time low pricing on the 2025 model 25W Qi2.2 Apple MagSafe Charger back down at $29 Prime shipped. Details below in the original post.

This deal might not last long – it didn’t yesterday anyway – but Amazon just dropped the brand new 25W Qi2.2 Apple MagSafe charger back down to the $29 Prime shipped all-time low.

items.title: All of the titles confirmed for Switch 2 GameCube library: Zelda Wind Waker, Mario Sunshine, F-Zero GX, more [Update #2]
items.summary:
Update 8/13: This post has been updated with the official release date for Chibi-Robo!

The My Nintendo Store Switch 2 pre-order invites have gone out and that means the first chance to score one of the new wireless GameCube controllers has too, but the actual Switch Online GameCube library won’t launch until June 5 when the Switch 2 does. Nintendo announced that it would be bringing GameCube to its classics library for Switch Online + Expansion Pack members alongside the Switch 2, but there are a few things you need to know about it and we’ll have a look at all of the games we know are coming to the service thus far down below.

items.title: Post-Prime Day Green Deals: Discounts still live on e-bikes, e-scooters, power stations, tools, more
items.summary:
Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days may be over, but that doesn’t mean the savings have to end – and we’re still seeing a large lineup of extended and hangover Green Deals. The savings train is staying in the station through the weekend, and even into the next week, with continued opportunities to score the best and latest eco-friendly tech at some of the lowest prices of the year. You’ll find ongoing sales on e-bikes, e-scooters, power stations, solar generator bundles, electric tools, outdoor devices, and other eco-friendly gadgets. Head below to browse the lasting lineup before its gone!
